item.title: Take A look at this :D
item.dc:creator: @Akriam Akriam
item.description:
@Akriam wrote:

This is my first Java program, and is no where near finished, but I cannot get it to compile, so I was hopping some of you guys could test it ;D

MoneyConverter1.0

What it does now:
-The program is just a window that comes up that has a list of some countrys you can click

What it will do:
This program hopefully will be able to convert ANY amount of US dollars into any amount of other money that the program supports

P.S.-don’t be too hard on me, it is my first program, and all it is as of now is a WINDOW with countrys on it So, tell me if it works!

//FirstJavaProgram/MoneyConverter
import java.text.*;
 import java.util.*;
import javax.swing.*;
import java.awt.*;

public class Currformat
{
 
   public static void main (String[] args)
   {
	Locale fra = new locale ("fr", "FR");
	Locale ger = new locale ("de", "DE");
	Locale us = new locale ("us", "US");
	Locale uk = new locale ("en", "GB");
	num = NumberFormat.getCurrencyInstance (fra) ;
	num = NumberFormat.getCurrencyInstance (ger) ;
	num = NumberFormat.getCurrencyInstance (us) ;
	num = NumberFormat.getCurrencyInstance (en) ;
}
}

class SwingWindow
{
  public Swingwindow ()
  {
	super("Money Converter 1.0") ;
	setsize (600, 300) ;
	setDefaultCloseOperation(JFrame.EXIT_ON_CLOSE) ;
	setVisible (true) ;
	
	Container contentArea = getContentPlane () ;
	contentArea.setBackground (Color.black) ;

	FlowLayout flowManager = new FlowLayout () ;
	content.Area,setLayout (flowManager) ;

	JButton playbutton = new JButton ("Germany") ;
	contentArea.add (playbutton) ;

	JButton playbutton = new JButton ("United States") ;
	contentArea.add (playbutton) ;

	JButton playbutton = new JButton ("United Kingdom") ;
	contentArea.add (playbutton) ;
	
	JButton playbutton = new JButton ("France") ;
	contentArea.add (playbutton) ;

	setContentPane (contentArea) ;
                }
              }

public class SwingButtons
{
  public static void main (String[] args)
  {
    SwingWindow Buttons = new SwingWindow () ;
}
}

public class Textarea
{
  public static void man (String[] args)	
  {
JTextArea comments = 
	new JTextArea ("Enter an amount of US dollars:", 3, 20) ;
contentArea.add (comments) ;

setContentPane (contentArea) ;

}
}
